attributes.action: Completely Revise The Awarding Of Honours
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I wish the government to stop giving honours to people for doing their jobs and to give them only where the recipient has demonstrated self sacrifice of time or effort but not money to benefit others or to benefit the country
E.G Jimmy Saville for services to the radio industry NO
Jimmy Saville for services to charity YES

To define Job I mean paid employment so that no awards would be given to anybody for Services to their paid employment whether that be MP,Civil Servant,Footballer,Dinner Lady or any other paid job

I hope that this will re4store faith in the honours system and end the honours for the boys culture
